insert into wechat_app_config (app_id, app_secret, app_name, app_type, token, encoding_aes_key, access_token, expires_in) values (#{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encodingAesKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiresIn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update wechat_app_config set app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_secret = #{appSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_type = #{appType,jdbcType=CHAR}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, encoding_aes_key = #{encodingAesKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_token = #{accessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expires_in = #{expiresIn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, app_id, app_secret, app_name, app_type, token, encoding_aes_key, access_token, expires_in, gmt_create, gmt_modified from wechat_app_config where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
